question: these days many children spend a great deal of time sitting in front of a television. some people believe that parents should strictly limit the time that children spend watching TV as it is harmful to their development. to what extent do you agree or disagree?
text: It is a common trend that, youngsters are addicted to on screen for losing their valuable time, which will be supervised by someone. Most of the people think that, parents who take responsibility for monitoring time period because, which is affecting their improvement of precious life, However, this essay will discuss that not only parents have to control but also the government.

Firstly, the young one who watches TV for a long period, suffer health problems such as losing the power of their eyes, getting back pain, headache and mental stress, furthermore missing their hours for study, sports and other hobbies, therefore huge difficulties should be faced to achieve their future goals. In addition to this little one has an idea about violence through watching unwanted programmes.

Parents has the power of control their children’s activities, for instance, allowed which channel to watch, manage their time to spend on television and encourage to make a dairy or take a note of TV shows, because there are some channels improve to our knowledge such as, discovery, news channel and cartoons ETC…

The government can able to influence on telecast station whether to prohibit some adult’s programme during 6 pm to 9 pm for an example, using alcohol, drugs and cigarettes and also banded some harmful advertisement.

It strikes me that, parents and the government should control the schedule that youngster expend on watching programmes on TV, as a consequence it will provide an easy way to accomplish their objectives.
